posts.post_title: looking for any 1909 Obak horizontal poses....
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

Looking to buy or trade for any of the following players from the 09 Obak set in any condition - Boyce, Brackenridge, Brown (sac), Hogan (vern), Martinke, Nelson, Wiggs or Reidy.  Thanks in advance,

Brian
